text: lamaa qutil qabyl 'akhah lm yueraf ma yasnae bjsdh, fa'arsil allah ghrabana yhfr hfrtan fi al'ard liadfin fiha ghrabana mayitana; lydl qabyl kayf yudfan juthman akhyh? ftejjab qabyl, wqal: aejzt 'an asne mithl snye hdha alghurab fastur eawrat akhy? fdafan qabyl akhah, feaqbh allah balndamt baed 'an raje balkhsran
